actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to increase the maximum amounts of operating and real estate loans which may be made under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the limitation requirements regarding real estate loans: (1) from $225,000 to $500,000 as to the unpaid indebtedness against the farm or other security at the time the loan is made; and (2) from $100,000 to $250,000 as to the loans to any one borrower. Increases from $50,000 to $150,000 the ceiling on the total principal indebtedness which may be outstanding at any one time for operating loans.

titles.title: A bill to increase the maximum amounts of operating and real estate loans which may be made under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
